title: Random disconnections
body: Am i the only one in Spark having random disconnections? I get randomly dc'd for about 5 times in a game.

replies.body:
Spark is a bad ISP, from what I've heard. The quickest solution to this would be to switch over to another ISP.

Are there any other applications open while you're playing League?
Nope no other applications. Spark wasn't like this before, it didn't give me lag spikes, sigh. Guess I have to live with this till they get their shit straight.

>Guess I have to live with this till they get their shit straight.

That rarely happens with big businesses. You should just chose one that does it right consistently and stick with it. And if there's a business that goes to fix its problems, then it probably creates new ones at the expense.
